definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: The process design for reconstruction and expansion engineering of Hunan Shizhuyuan Bismuth Smelter is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍湖南柿竹园公司铋冶炼改扩建的工艺设计。

sentences.english: I bought some souvenirs in Bamboo Garden for my best friend.
sentences.chinese: 我在万竹园里买了一些纪念品给我最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Chinese Bamboo garden is also a part of the bamboo culture.
sentences.chinese: 中国式竹园也是竹文化的一部分。

sentences.english: If you want to Chuk Yuen Estate to buy lychees, the villagers will take you to lychee Island.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想去竹园村购荔枝，村民就会带你来到荔枝岛。

sentences.english: ATS48(JN4092) was seen here at Queensway heading for Chuk Yuen Estate in Kowloon.
sentences.chinese: 这天ATS48正取道金钟道，向九龙竹园村进发。

sentences.english: The dewatering feature of the fluorite concentrate in Shizhuyuan Mine has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了柿竹园萤石精矿的脱水特性。

definition: Longtan district of Jilin city 吉林市, Jilin province/see also 龍潭|龙潭[long2 tan2]/Longtan or Lungtan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
dragon pool/dragon pond/see also 龍潭|龙潭[Long2 tan2]
Zhuxi county in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei
Hsinyuan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Zhushan county in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei/Zhushan or Chushan town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Dayuan or Tayuan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
Longan district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
